name: Freezy Fiends
description:
Submission for UW Bothell Winter 2020  Game Jam 

Objective: Have a snowball fight with your friends (or fiends)

Work together with the two player classes, Abominable and Classic Snowman, to dominate the snow-field.

Join in with X and touch team color to choose your team

Abominable Snowman

  • Does not start with snow. Must pick up from the ground
  • Gets hurt with snowballs
  • If all of them on their team dies, their team loses

Classic Snowman

  • Snow is life
  • Getting hit by snowballs heal it
  • Throwing snowballs hurts it

Tested with Dualshock 4 controllers

  • Menu Controls 
    • Square to select an option
    • Left Analog Stick to move cursor
  • Gameplay Controls
    • X to join
    • Circle to Drop out
    • Left Stick to move
    • Right Stick to aim
    • L1 to pickup snow
    • R1 to throw a snowball
